Layer.TotalSongCheckCommand: %function(self) local Pr = PROFILEMAN:GetMachineProfile():GetSaved() if not Pr.DWITotalSongsPlayedP1 then self:settext('0') Pr.DWITotalSongsPlayedP1 = 0 PROFILEMAN:SaveMachineProfile() else self:settext( Pr.DWITotalSongsPlayedP1 ) end end

Layer.CheckLabelCommand: %function(self) local Pr = PROFILEMAN:GetMachineProfile():GetSaved() if Pr.DWIHighestSessionScore then self:settext('Highest Session Score') else self:settext('Highest Score') end end

Layer.TotalSongCheckCommand: %function(self) local Pr = PROFILEMAN:GetMachineProfile():GetSaved() if not Pr.DWIHighestScoreP1 or not Pr.DWIHighestSessionScoreP1 then self:settext(' ') Pr.DWIHighestScoreP1 = 0 Pr.DWIHighestSessionScoreP1 = 0 PROFILEMAN:SaveMachineProfile() else if Pr.DWIHighestSessionScore then self:settext( string.format('% 9d', Pr.DWIHighestSessionScoreP1 ) ) else self:settext( string.format('% 9d', Pr.DWIHighestScoreP1 ) ) end end end

%function(self) local Pr = PROFILEMAN:GetMachineProfile():GetSaved() if not Pr.DWIHighestComboP1 then self:settext('0') Pr.DWIHighestComboP1 = 0 PROFILEMAN:SaveMachineProfile() else self:settext( Pr.DWIHighestComboP1 ) end end

%function(self) local possible = PROFILEMAN:GetMachineProfile():GetCoursesPossible(STEPS_TYPE_DANCE_SINGLE,COURSE_DIFFICULTY_REGULAR)+ PROFILEMAN:GetMachineProfile():GetCoursesPossible(STEPS_TYPE_DANCE_SINGLE,COURSE_DIFFICULTY_DIFFICULT) local actual = PROFILEMAN:GetMachineProfile():GetCoursesActual(STEPS_TYPE_DANCE_SINGLE,COURSE_DIFFICULTY_REGULAR)+ PROFILEMAN:GetMachineProfile():GetCoursesActual(STEPS_TYPE_DANCE_SINGLE,COURSE_DIFFICULTY_DIFFICULT) self:settext( string.format( '%5.2f', ( possible - actual ) ) ..'%' ) end

%function(self) local Pr = PROFILEMAN:GetMachineProfile():GetSaved() if not Pr.DWIHighestScoreNonstopP1 then self:settext( string.format('% 9d','0') ) Pr.DWIHighestScoreNonstopP1 = 0 PROFILEMAN:SaveMachineProfile() else self:settext( string.format('% 9d', Pr.DWIHighestScoreNonstopP1 ) ) end end
